description: Statement for an account for a given billing cycle

account_id.description: The Canopy-generated ID for the account

statement_id.description: The Canopy-generated ID for the statement

effective_as_of_date.description: The `Date-Time` you would like the system to return the data as of. IE tell me what the account information was as if I had asked on `2020-10-20 00:00:00 EST`. If empty it defaults to current time.

promo_purchase_window_inclusive_start.description: If applicable, the `Date-Time` the purchase window for the account ends.

promo_purchase_window_exclusive_end.description: If applicable, the `Date-Time` the purchase window for the account ends.

promo_inclusive_start.description: If applicable, the `Date-Time` the promo period for the account starts.

promo_exclusive_end.description: If applicable, the `Date-Time` the promo period for the account ends.

account_status.description: The Status of the Account. Active upon account creation.

account_status_subtype.description: The subtype of the Status of the Account. Null upon account creation.

credit_limit_cents.description: Total Amount (in cents) that this account can borrow.

total_charges_cents.description: Sum of all charges that occurred on the account since account origination.

available_credit_cents.description: The total available credit balance (in cents) for the account.

open_to_buy_cents.description: If applicable, the total amount of available funds for continued purchase following a purchase window pattern, where payments made do not replenish amount available for purchase.

cycle_inclusive_start.description: The inclusive starting `Date-Time` that defines which transations are part of this statement.

cycle_exclusive_end.description: The inclusive ending `Date-Time` that defines which transations are part of this statement.

cycle_charges_cents.description: Sum of all charges that occurred on the account during the billing cycle.

cycle_loans_cents.description: Sum of all loans amounts that were initiated on the account during the billing cycle.

cycle_charge_returns_cents.description: Sum of all returns that occurred on the account during the billing cycle.

cycle_payments_cents.description: Sum of all payments that occurred on the account during the billing cycle.

cycle_payment_reversals_cents.description: Sum of all payment reversal amounts that occurred on the account during the billing cycle.

cycle_debit_adjustments_cents.description: Sum of all debit adjustment amounts that occurred on the account during the billing cycle.

cycle_credit_adjustments_cents.description: Sum of all credit adjustment amounts that occurred on the account during the billing cycle.

cycle_interest_cents.description: Total interest accrued during the billing cycle.

cycle_am_interest_cents.description: The current AM interest balance of the line item. Canopy tracks interest during an amortization period separately from deferred interest accrued during a revolving period.

cycle_deferred_interest_cents.description: Total interest accrued during the billing cycle.

cycle_am_deferred_interest_cents.description: Total interest accrued during the billing cycle. Canopy tracks deferred interest during an amortization period separately from deferred interest accrued during a revolving period.

cycle_late_fees_cents.description: Total late fees incurred during the billing cycle.

cycle_payment_reversals_fees_cents.description: Total payment reversal fees incurred during the billing cycle.

cycle_waived_deferred_interest_cents.description: Total deferred interest that was forgiven on the account during the billing cycle.

min_pay_cents.description: Total amount due for the billing cycle, summing cycle principal, interest, deferred interest, and fees outstanding.

min_pay_due_at.description: The `Date-Time` the payment for this billing cycle is due.

min_pay_charges_principal_cents.description: Total principal due for the billing cycle.

min_pay_interest_cents.description: Total interest due for the billing cycle.

min_pay_am_interest_cents.description: Total am interest due for the billing cycle.

min_pay_deferred_cents.description: Total deferred interest due for the billing cycle.

min_pay_am_deferred_interest_cents.description: The current AM deferred interest balance of the line item. Canopy tracks deferred interest during an amortization period separately from deferred interest accrued during a revolving period.

min_pay_fees_cents.description: Total fees due for the billing cycle.

previous_min_pay_cents.description: Previous amounts due, including fees. This is a subset of min_pay_cents.

charges_principal_cents.description: Total principal balance for the account.

loans_principal_cents.description: Total principal balance for loans for the account.

interest_balance_cents.description: Total interest balance for the account.

am_interest_balance_cents.description: Total AM interest balance for the account.

deferred_interest_balance_cents.description: Total deferred interest balance for the account.

am_deferred_interest_balance_cents.description: The total deferred interest balance (in cents) associated with the account.

fees_balance_cents.description: Total fee balance for the account.

total_balance_cents.description: The total balance (in cents) associated with the account.

total_payoff_cents.description: The total amount needed to pay off the loan at this exact moment.

expected_remaining_payment_amount_cents.description: The total amount slated to pay off the account over the lifecycle of the loan.

line_items.description: A snapshot of all line items that occurred during the cycle and were `VALID` at the time of Statement cut.
